repulse.translation[0].definitions[0].de: if something or someone repulses you, you think that they are extremely unpleasant
repulse.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: The very thought of his cold clammy hands repulsed me.
repulse.translation[0].definitions[1].de: to fight someone and successfully stop their attack on you
repulse.translation[0].definitions[1].ex: Government troops repulsed an attack by rebel forces.
repulse.translation[0].definitions[2].de: to refuse an offer of friendship or help in a way that is rude
